name: Slayers - Suiriyuuou no Kishi
nutshell:
After meeting the enigmatic woman Hureika in a sideside village during her travels, the beautiful genius sorceress Lina Inverses fate takes a dramatic turn. Separated from her partner Gourry, she finds herself swept ashore onto an unfamiliar land. Faced with violent monsters, she is suddenly unable to wield her magic. But her grand adventures only begin once she is saved by Lyos, a boy who claims himself to be the Knight of the Aqua Lord.
An alternate retelling of the Slayers TRY anime.

name: Rainbow Trotsky
nutshell:
From MangaHelpers:
A historical manga by the author of "Gundam The Origin," set in Manchuria (Manchokoku) during the first years of the Showa period. The protagonist is a half-Japanese, half-Mongolian amnesiac who attends Kenkoku University in the capital of Manchukoku. A tale of spy intrigue, pertaining to the secret of a conspiracy known as "Project Trotsky.

name: Nakimushi-kun wa, Ijiwaru Akuma no Iinari
nutshell:
"Show me more of your cute crying face."
"Gh...! Who'd want to show you...?"
University student Mizuki suddenly gets close to Kyouya, the younger twin brother of his crush. He's never talked to him, but he seems to be a pretty good guy...? He barely had time to think about it, but Kyouya already seemed to know who Mizuki likes...?! Confused, he even ended up revealing that he's a crybaby! The trouble doubles! Even worse, Kyouya pushes his hot tongue into his mouth, making his hole tingle.
"Let me make you cry."

name: Marry Max!
nutshell: Following the last request of her former-idol mother, Marie began to search for her estranged brother. Her only clues are that he is a boy with the initial called M.K. and that he has the same cross-shaped birthmark as she does. In order to search for her brother, Marie entered show business, only to encounter all kinds of trouble!

name: Isshou Tsuzukerarenai Shigoto
nutshell: Hayasaka Yoshihito is so impressed by lawyer Mikami Haruhiko that he decides to work with him at his small law firm. But it's not quite what Hayasaka's expecting. With the sexually harrassing lawyer Katayama Masaki who doesn't seem to do anything, scary secretary Shingyouji Miho, and Mikami himself who isn't quite the way Hayasaka remembers, things are about to get interesting for this idealistic young lawyer!

name: Kaeru no★Prince-sama
nutshell: The socially awkward Aono was perfectly happy working in Quality Control as but fate would have it, he's been transferred to the Sales Department. As if being ridiculed by his co-workers for his nervous stutter isn't bad enough, he's thoroughly mortified when the departmental star Gouzaka overhears him having a breakdown on the roof. But no matter how often he pushes Gouzaka away or how fast Aono runs, Gouzaka is always there by his side… Has this timid frog finally found his Prince Charming?

name: Akaku Naru no wa Kiminosei
nutshell:
Iwasaki-san wa Keisandakai
Kawaiitte Iwanaide
Kiss mo Madana Watashi desu.
Akaku Naru no wa Kiminosei

name: B.O.D.Y.
nutshell: Everyone thinks 16-year-old Ryoko has weird taste in guys because she can't stop drooling over Ryu, the strong silent type who sits next to her in class. When she discovers he works for a host club–where women actually pay men to date them–will she finally wise up? Only one thing's for sure in B.O.D.Y.–you can't put a price on love!

name: Sensei wa Dummy
nutshell: Yunogi has no working experience, but after being tricked into thinking he got a normal job out of luck, it turns out it's not so normal after all. Yunogi has to act as horror writer Kirino Shuusuke's stand-in.

name: Yakkyoku no Pochiyama-san
nutshell: Pochiyama-san works at a local pharmacy. She is a loner and seldom speaks; instead she writes what she wants to say.

name: Shinshi wa Munamoto ni Ai wo Himeru
nutshell:
溢れ出る色気、醸し出すインテリジェンス…「セクシー御曹司」降臨!!!!!
会社帰りに立ち寄ったお店でいつものようにお酒を楽しんでいた綾香は気だるげなイケメン（※胸元がはだけた紳士）と出会った。
ほろ酔い状態の彼は突然涙を流し、初対面の綾香に悩みを打ち明ける。
「僕の悩みは顔が良くて金があることだよ」
庶民にとっては一生共感できない予想の斜め上をいく悩みにびっくりする綾香だったが、
お互いウィスキー好きという共通点もあり意気投合、そしてふたりで夜の街へ繰り出すことに…。
記憶をなくすほど飲んでしまい気づけば翌朝、綾香は見知らぬ部屋で目を覚ます。
身の危険を感じた綾香はあわててその場を立ち去るも、思わぬところで彼と再会し――…!?

name: Love Live! NicoMaki - How Do You Feel About Us?
nutshell:
Bickering like and old married couple, methinks.
Original at:
https://restof14.postype.com/post/6086583

name: Kinchou Suru to Tenparu Onnanoko no Hanashi
Underground Brawl
nutshell:
UB (Underground Brawl) is an ultimate fighting tournament that doesn't follow the standard rules of the official sport, UFC (Ultimate Fighting Championship). Consequently, this tournament is hidden from the public and has become a playground for the upper class. But one man is destined to end the cruel government's uprise. That man is Jack Knife.
The story will mostly focus on Jack's fighting encounters in the UB tournament and how he will recover his forgotten past.

name: Pure Blue
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Boys' Love,School Life,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Close childhood friends Baishan and Wangzi entered the same high school and made another good friend Yangyang. The three of them are getting closer by the day, but it seems like something is quietly changing…

name: Ikai Hanjouki Hiyokoya Shouten
nutshell:
Riku Fukagawa was found at the age of ten with no memory and no relatives. Despite this, he manages to make a good life for himself, until five years later, when he runs into his real family at a flea market. They whisk him away to their home, in another world called Yamato that strongly resembles the Japan of the Edo era. They explain to him that he, four of his five brothers, and two of his cousins run a store, the Hiyokoya Store, in the capital of Yamato. He doesn’t believe them, but because they’re so protective of him, he decides to take on a part time job at the store… Why are family reunions always so crazy?!
Wikipedia
English
Japanese
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon
Vol. 1
Vol. 2
Vol. 3
Vol. 4
Vol. 5

name: My Maid Is a Demon
nutshell: On his birthday, university student Bai XiaoShu suddenly receives a strange phone call from his father. Afterwards, he is inexplicably chased by people dressed in black who are intent on taking his life. Bai XiaoShu follows his father’s instructions and returns to his family residence. On the brink of death, he makes a contract with a devil. When he awakens, he finds himself face-to-face with an adorable girl who calls herself his maid. However, all of the strange events in his story… have only just begun…

name: The God of Pain's Groom
nutshell:
That is, until one day, Forrest Clandor refuses to be wedded and attend a typical high school house party instead. Fortunately, her twin brother River Clandor is up for the task. He pretends to be Forrest and step up to ‘marry’ Khaol. He doesn’t believe that the whole thing is real, until Khaol really does show up and accepts him as his groom.
Can River handle being married to a mercurial, short-tempered God? And how did his family end up in this situation anyway? Also, why doesn’t Khaol seem to mind that he just married a guy?
PT/Br:
A família de River, está ligada a Khaol, o Deus da dor. Eles são os descendentes diretos do servo mais leal de Khaol, e são obrigados a fornecer uma descendente feminina para ser a noiva humana de Khaol, a cada poucos séculos. Pelo menos, é isso que a avó de River, que é profundamente dedicada aos deuses, disse a ele. Já Forrest, a irmã gêmea turbulenta de River, não acredita nas histórias e mitos, e ela é muito teimosa para se convencer do contrário. Quando é sua vez de se casar com Khaol, ela decide ir a uma festa. Então River, vai no lugar de sua irmã.

name: Hajimete o Anata to
nutshell:
Hajimete wo Anata to


Saigo no Yoru ni


Kareshi ni Tsuite no Nayamigoto


Angel Sky

name: Heike Monogatari Yoru-kun no Hanashi
nutshell:
One day, Haruno Yoru (a high school boy) and Futaki Sara (a high school girl) were abducted to the Heian Period and turned into "Taira no Noriko" and "Minamoto no Yoshitsune." They arrived when the Heike clan had risen to power and was ruled by the leader of the clan, Taira no Kiyomori. Yoru, who was desired by Kiyomori to become empress Taira no Tokuto, got separated. While searching for Sara, he spends his time with the Heike people.
Will the two be reunited!? Will history lead them to destruction!? A high tension "Tale of the Heike"!

name: Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo
nutshell: Crossover oneshot between Yankee-kun to Megane-chan and Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo. Both works are from the same manga author.

name: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World
nutshell: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

name: Human System
nutshell:
"Exactly, what am I?" A human-made robot that is used for battles meets a blind girl, Lilina, while running away. He is slowly captivated by Lilina as she doesn't see him as a robot, but suddenly someone who targets the both of them appears? Moreover, Lilina also has a secret of her own?
Included one-shots:
Gekkou Romance (Moonlight Romance; 月光ロマンス)
Akai Ito (The Red Thread; 赤い糸)

name: The Golden Light of Dawn
nutshell:
You're still precious to me.
After losing her family in a demon attack, Rosha is reborn as the 777th most powerful magic knight in the Golden Dawn Society. To avenge her family, she trains hard and rises through the ranks against the odds. Then, she is tasked with protecting little Joshua, who is said to be the Child of God...

name: Takarazora
nutshell:
Yuuchi is a girl who has a passion for art…. or rather, HAD a passion for art. Because of her mother's disapproval, Yuuchi had to give up painting. Still, she had made a promise to her baseball-loving friend, Natsu, that she'd paint a picture of him. Having given up on her dreams, Yuuchi now must find the "hope" within herself to continue.
(Source: Intercross)

name: Love Life
nutshell: Shinohara Satoru didn't expect the big move to Tokyo to be easy, however his cast of neighbors isn't helping, especially Izumi Yuushin…

name: One Semester Servant
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Instead of trying to express his feelings to the girl he likes, Revan gets bad luck because his love letter was found by her friend. Because he didn’t want the letter to leak, he had to be Yesika’s servant for one semester!

name: Ares
nutshell: The story takes place in an era similar to that of ancient Rome in a country called Cronos. It follows a group known as the Temple Mercenaries. In particular, the manhwa is about Ares, Michael and Baroona, three young warriors with mysterious pasts and surpassing skills…

name: Hitai ni Mikazuki
nutshell: Ten years ago, Yutaka followed Azusa but ended up falling from a tree. Because of that, she has a moon shaped scar on her forehead. Then the two separated, but when he came back, he was a shinobi!
